attributes.action: Compulsory for new vehicles to be fitted with cameras for accident prevention
attributes.additional_details:
Car Accident

This is the most obvious reason why a dash cam is a great idea.  As rideshare drivers, police and the general public will want to immediately jump to the conclusion that we were at fault. 

Sexual Harassment – Discouraging It and Defending Against It

This differs depending on whether you are a male or female driver.  If you are a female driver, having a visible dash cam can prevent men riders from being too friendly.
attributes.background: This is a petition to raise awareness about fraudulent accident claims and speed up the genuine claims process. Cameras will deter fraudsters resulting in reduced premiums for the general public and freeing up valuable police time.
